meta.title: Yamada UI
meta.description: Provides a design system that delivers beautiful, consistent, accessible components and advanced styling. Bring your ideas to life.

home.title: Unleash the Power of Components
home.description: Provides a design system that delivers beautiful, consistent, accessible components and advanced styling. Bring your ideas to life.

examples.title: Build Applications
examples.description: Build beautiful and accessible applications with over 30 languages. Themes can also be switched for each user to enhance usability.

icons.title: Beautiful & Consistent Icons
icons.description: A collection of ready-to-use icons built with Lucide. Copy and paste into your apps.
icons.reset: Clear your search and try again

playground.title: Try Code in Real-time
playground.description: An interactive playground where you can try Yamada UI components in real-time. You can also copy the code and paste it into your projects.

confirmation.title: Reset Code
confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset the code to the default example? This action cannot be undone.

themes.title: Your Own Themes
themes.description: Try out beautiful and consistent themes. Copy and paste them into your projects. New theme editor coming soon.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.latest: Explore the changelog for the latest version of Yamada UI. Learn about the features, bug fixes, and improvements.
changelog.version: Explore the changelog for {name} version {version}. Learn about the features, bug fixes, and improvements.

footer.copyright: Built by <owner>Hirotomo Yamada</owner> and <contributors>these awesome people</contributors>

codeBlock.clientOnly: If you use this code, you need to add <tag>"use client"</tag> to the top of the file.
